title: Pain au Chocolat
ingredients: ['60ml warm water', '310g bread flour', '2 tablespoons dried skimmed milk', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons butter, softened', '1 1/2 teaspoons fast action yeast', '120g butter, softened', '1 egg yolk', '1 tablespoon milk', '1kg plain chocolate, broken into pieces']
